KubeSchedulingConfig.description: Kubernetes scheduling config for predictor and transformer

subject.description: Subject to be encoded in JWT

renewable.description: Flag to indicate if the token is auto-renewable

expLeeway.description: Number of seconds after the expiration the token is still valid

expiresAt.description: Expiration date for the new JWT

nbf.description: Not-valid-before date for the new JWT

JsonWebTokenDTO.description: Specification to renew an existing JWT

modelPath.description: HOPSFS directory path containing the model

availableInstances.description: Number of serving instances available for serving

availableTransformerInstances.description: Number of serving instances available for transformers serving

requestedInstances.description: Number of serving instances to use for serving

requestedTransformerInstances.description: Number of serving instances to use for the transformer

internalPort.description: Internal port on which the Serving instance(s) are listening

hopsworksInferencePath.description: Hopsworks REST API inference path on which the deployment can be reached

modelServerInferencePath.description: Model server inference path on which the deployment can be reached

created.description: Date on which the Serving entry was created

modelServer.description: Model server, Tensorflow Serving or Python

deployed.description: Date on which the Serving was deployed

revision.description: Revision identifier of the last deployment

apiProtocol.description: API protocol for the deployment (e.g., GRPC or REST).

creator.description: User whom created the Serving entry

kafkaTopicSchema.description: Schema name for the Kafka topic used for logging

kafkaTopicSchemaVersion.description: Schema version for the Kafka topic used for logging
